name: Restarting Circumstances
description:
IMPORTANT: THE FIRST POTION YOU GET GIVES YOU THE ABILITY TO GRAB BOXES AND THE SECOND ONE GIVES YOU DOUBLE JUMP!

Made for the VimJam / Theme: There and Back

A short game about collectables

Controls, How to play and Credits are all in the Menu, thanks!

Also, I'm just starting to develop games and I would like your feedback so I can improve next time I participate in another jam! 

Thanks for playing.

Just a thing, you really want to know what is in top of the tower, but you already though what is below it?
